strings.string: SELECT @_RECORDCOUNTLIMIT@ Periods.SHIFTSYSTEMNAME,Periods.SHIFTNAME ,PeriodeTypeNum,dbo.PeriodTypeName(Periods.PeriodeTypeNum,'@LCID@') AS PeriodeTypeName ,Count(*) AS [Count] ,SUM(Periods.[LENGTH]) AS SUMTime ,(CASE Periods.PeriodeTypeNum WHEN 4 THEN -1 WHEN 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * SUM(Periods.[LENGTH]) AS SUMTimeDT ,P1.SUMSUMTime ,SUM([QTYproduced]) AS SUMProdCount ,SUM([Cycles]) AS SUMCycles FROM Reports_Periods AS Periods INNER JOIN (SELECT P11.SHIFTSYSTEMNAME AS _SHIFTSYSTEMNAME ,P11.SHIFTNAME AS _SHIFTNAME ,SUM(P11.[LENGTH]) AS SUMSUMTime FROM Reports_Periods2 AS P11 WHERE 1=1 @kSHIFTSYSTEMNAME@ @kSHIFTNAME@ @kSTARTFrom@ @kSTARTTo@ GROUP BY P11.SHIFTSYSTEMNAME, P11.SHIFTNAME) AS P1 ON P1._SHIFTSYSTEMNAME = Periods.SHIFTSYSTEMNAME AND P1._SHIFTNAME = Periods.SHIFTNAME WHERE (1=1) AND Periods.SHIFTSYSTEMNAME IS NOT NULL @kSHIFTSYSTEMNAME@ @kSHIFTNAME@ @kSTARTFrom@ @kSTARTTo@ GROUP BY Periods.SHIFTSYSTEMNAME, Periods.SHIFTNAME, P1.SUMSUMTime, Periods.PeriodeTypeNum

SELECT @_RECORDCOUNTLIMIT@ Periods.SHIFTSYSTEMNAME,Periods.SHIFTNAME ,Periods.MachineId,Periods.MachineName ,PeriodeTypeNum,dbo.PeriodTypeName(Periods.PeriodeTypeNum,'@LCID@') AS PeriodeTypeName ,Count(*) AS [Count] ,SUM(Periods.[LENGTH]) AS SUMTime ,(CASE Periods.PeriodeTypeNum WHEN 4 THEN -1 WHEN 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * SUM(Periods.[LENGTH]) AS SUMTimeDT ,P1.SUMSUMTime ,SUM([QTYproduced]) AS SUMProdCount ,SUM([Cycles]) AS SUMCycles FROM Reports_Periods AS Periods INNER JOIN (SELECT P11.SHIFTSYSTEMNAME AS _SHIFTSYSTEMNAME ,P11.SHIFTNAME AS _SHIFTNAME ,P11.MachineId AS _MachineId ,SUM(P11.[LENGTH]) AS SUMSUMTime FROM Reports_Periods2 AS P11 WHERE 1=1 @kSHIFTSYSTEMNAME@ @kSHIFTNAME@ @kAssemblyLineId@ @kSTARTFrom@ @kSTARTTo@ GROUP BY P11.SHIFTSYSTEMNAME, P11.SHIFTNAME, P11.MachineId) AS P1 ON P1._SHIFTSYSTEMNAME = Periods.SHIFTSYSTEMNAME AND P1._SHIFTNAME = Periods.SHIFTNAME AND P1._MachineId = Periods.MachineId WHERE (1=1) AND Periods.SHIFTSYSTEMNAME IS NOT NULL @kSHIFTSYSTEMNAME@ @kSHIFTNAME@ @kAssemblyLineId@ @kSTARTFrom@ @kSTARTTo@ GROUP BY Periods.SHIFTSYSTEMNAME, Periods.SHIFTNAME, Periods.MachineId, Periods.MachineName, P1.SUMSUMTime, Periods.PeriodeTypeNum

SELECT @_RECORDCOUNTLIMIT@ Periods.SHIFTSYSTEMNAME, Periods.SHIFTNAME ,Periods.MachineId,Periods.MachineName ,Periods.PeriodeTypeNum,dbo.PeriodTypeName(Periods.PeriodeTypeNum,'@LCID@') AS PeriodeTypeName ,Periods.DTRidandname ,Count(*) AS [Count] ,SUM(Periods.[LENGTH]) AS SUMTime ,(CASE Periods.PeriodeTypeNum WHEN 4 THEN -1 WHEN 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * SUM(Periods.[LENGTH]) AS SUMTimeDT ,MIN(Periods.[LENGTH]) AS MINTime, MAX(Periods.[LENGTH]) AS MAXTime ,P1.SUMSUMTime ,SUM([QTYproduced]) AS SUMProdCount ,SUM([Cycles]) AS SUMCycles FROM Reports_Periods AS Periods INNER JOIN (SELECT P11.SHIFTSYSTEMNAME AS _SHIFTSYSTEMNAME ,P11.SHIFTNAME AS _SHIFTNAME ,P11.MachineId AS _MachineId ,SUM(P11.[LENGTH]) AS SUMSUMTime FROM Reports_Periods2 AS P11 WHERE 1=1 @kSHIFTSYSTEMNAME@ @kSHIFTNAME@ @kAssemblyLineId@ @kSTARTFrom@ @kSTARTTo@ GROUP BY P11.SHIFTSYSTEMNAME, P11.SHIFTNAME, P11.MachineId) AS P1 ON P1._SHIFTSYSTEMNAME = Periods.SHIFTSYSTEMNAME AND P1._SHIFTNAME = Periods.SHIFTNAME AND P1._MachineId = Periods.MachineId WHERE (1=1) AND Periods.SHIFTSYSTEMNAME IS NOT NULL @kSHIFTSYSTEMNAME@ @kSHIFTNAME@ @kAssemblyLineId@ @kSTARTFrom@ @kSTARTTo@ GROUP BY Periods.SHIFTSYSTEMNAME, Periods.SHIFTNAME, Periods.MachineId, Periods.MachineName, P1.SUMSUMTime, Periods.PeriodeTypeNum, Periods.DTRidandname

SELECT @_RECORDCOUNTLIMIT@ Periods.SHIFTSYSTEMNAME, Periods.SHIFTNAME ,Periods.TEAMID,Periods.TEAMNAME,Periods.TEAMINFO ,Periods.PeriodeTypeNum,dbo.PeriodTypeName(Periods.PeriodeTypeNum,'@LCID@') AS PeriodeTypeName ,Periods.DTRidandname ,Count(*) AS [Count] ,SUM(Periods.[LENGTH]) AS SUMTime ,(CASE Periods.PeriodeTypeNum WHEN 4 THEN -1 WHEN 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * SUM(Periods.[LENGTH]) AS SUMTimeDT ,MIN(Periods.[LENGTH]) AS MINTime, MAX(Periods.[LENGTH]) AS MAXTime ,P1.SUMSUMTime ,SUM([QTYproduced]) AS SUMProdCount ,SUM([Cycles]) AS SUMCycles FROM Reports_Periods AS Periods INNER JOIN (SELECT P11.SHIFTSYSTEMNAME AS _SHIFTSYSTEMNAME ,P11.SHIFTNAME AS _SHIFTNAME ,P11.TEAMID AS _TEAMID ,SUM(P11.[LENGTH]) AS SUMSUMTime FROM Reports_Periods2T AS P11 WHERE 1=1 @kSHIFTSYSTEMNAME@ @kSHIFTNAME@ @kTeamId@ @kSTARTFrom@ @kSTARTTo@ GROUP BY P11.SHIFTSYSTEMNAME, P11.SHIFTNAME, P11.TEAMID) AS P1 ON P1._SHIFTSYSTEMNAME = Periods.SHIFTSYSTEMNAME AND P1._SHIFTNAME = Periods.SHIFTNAME AND P1._TEAMID = Periods.TEAMID WHERE (1=1) AND Periods.SHIFTSYSTEMNAME IS NOT NULL @kSHIFTSYSTEMNAME@ @kSHIFTNAME@ @kTeamId@ @kSTARTFrom@ @kSTARTTo@ GROUP BY Periods.SHIFTSYSTEMNAME, Periods.SHIFTNAME, Periods.TEAMID, Periods.TEAMNAME, Periods.TEAMINFO, P1.SUMSUMTime, Periods.PeriodeTypeNum, Periods.DTRidandname

SELECT @_RECORDCOUNTLIMIT@ * ,Periods.PeriodeTypeNum,dbo.PeriodTypeName(Periods.PeriodeTypeNum,'@LCID@') AS PeriodeTypeName FROM Reports_Periods AS Periods WHERE 1=1 @kSHIFTSYSTEMNAME@ @kSHIFTNAME@ @kAssemblyLineId@ @kSTARTFrom@ @kSTARTTo@ @kPERIODETYPE@ @kDTR@
